conversation.speaker: USER
conversation.text: I'm in the mood for a backstage musical movie. Could you recommend a few?

conversation.speaker: SYSTEM
conversation.text: I recommend 'The Wizard of Oz' due to its classic musical status with Judy Garland's enchanting performance. The iconic yellow brick road and memorable songs add to the cinematic experience.

conversation.text: For a primarily Irish experience, I recommend 'The Guard' (2011). This film follows an unconventional Irish policeman and his partnership with an uptight FBI agent to investigate a drug-smuggling ring. Enjoy the mix of Irish culture and crime investigation!
